channel.title: Bianry :: Aceberg's wiki
channel.description: All binary packages can be found in latest release. There are .deb, .rpm, .apk (Alpine Linux) and .tar.gz files. Supported architectures: amd64, i386, arm_v5, arm_v6, arm_v7, arm64. Dependencies: arp-scan, tzdata. For amd64 there is a deb repo available
